location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'L. Shaikh Ahmad al-Haiya'i, of Dhank, Al Bu Shams. R. Son of Above. C. Shaikh Ibrahim bin Uthman, Abu Dhabi Wali'

mods.abstract: Two black and white photographs with their subjects identified in writing below each one. The first shows Shaikh Ahmad al-Haiya'i of Dhank (of the Al Bu Shams tribe) accompanied by his son (who is not named). The second shows Shaikh Ibrahim bin Uthman, the Wali of Abu Dhabi standing in the middle of two unidentified men.
